prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Bass, Piano, Guitar, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the Pipe, Piano, Bass, and Guitar, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of the Pipe, Bass, Piano, and Guitar, omitting the Drums.

Style 3:
The Pipe, Piano, Bass, and Guitar are all present in this song, but the Drums are absent.
